fields.name: link_to_ticket
fields.label: Link to ticket
fields.description: Link of the ticket selling portal

fields.label: Active
fields.name: active
fields.description: You can active or deactive the hero

fields.label: TitleImage
fields.name: titleImage
fields.description: The image to display as title (band name or song title)

fields.label: Subtitle
fields.name: subtitle
fields.description: some further information under the title, for example (Sond is available on YouTube)

fields.label: Link
fields.name: link
fields.description: The link where the button should redirect the user

fields.label: Fallback Image (Desktop)
fields.name: fallbackImageDesktop
fields.description: Fallback image for desktop devices. This is important because some device wont let you autoplay the video

fields.label: Fallback Image (Mobile)
fields.name: fallbackImageMobile
fields.description: Fallback image for mobile devices. This is important because some device wont let you autoplay the video

fields.label: Background Video (Desktop)
fields.name: backgroundVideoDesktop
fields.description: Image for desktop devices if the hero's background is a video

fields.label: Background Video (Mobile)
fields.name: backgroundVideoMobile
fields.description: Image for mobile devices if the hero's background is a video

fields.label: Background Opacity (percentage)
fields.name: backgroundOpacityPercentage
fields.description: Opacity of the background image or video
